caption.center: Alan Wesley ROLLS, Appellant, v. STATE of Florida, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.800 Appeal from the Circuit Court for Brevard County, David Dugan, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Alan Wesley Rolls, Clermont, pro se.
No Appearance for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED. See Carter v. State, 786 So.2d 1173 (Fla. 2001);Robinson v. State, 692 So.2d 275 (Fla. 5th DCA 1997).
PETERSON, SAWAYA and PALMER, JJ., concur.
